post/2005/REBOL Tutorial Chapter Added

date

2005-02-27
tags

note/2005

Work has been keeping me fairly busy. Sadly, not doing much programming. It turns out that some days just involve finding a bug and then finding out who is responsible for fixing that bug. I love my job, but there’s a bit of a bureaucratic aspect to it sometimes. But I digress. I took a few hours out of my weekend to write post/2005/REBOL Babysteps - 03 Making Decisions, covering if and either and selection statements used in the language. It’s still pretty sparse, but I will definitely touch it up from any feedback from you Fine Folks.
